title: Baxter Holmes and Brian Scalabrine
description:
Zach asks ESPN's Baxter Holmes to take us behind the scenes of his Robert Sarver story, then Brian Scalabrine helps dissect a wild week for the Boston Celtics. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
